WorkItem.Description:
ITEM EDITOR
 
I was looking for a spot to put gems in as the head and back items I was looking for weren't listed and I was hoping to reproduce the stats for the items I couldn't find. I realised that the "Special Effects" wasn't what I wanted, so I cancelled the action. This is when I got the error. Tried this on a number of different items. Failed each time. Didn't make any difference.
 
 
(Macintosh OS x 10.5.8 iMac 24" 3.06 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, 4gb)
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1)  Select any item from the right-hand window
2)  Select "Edit" from the drop down menu
3)  Click on the ADD button for the section marked "Special Effects"
4)  on subsequent dialog box, clicked "cancel"
5)  dialog box disappears, Error message below is displayed.
 
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments:
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=3.0.50106.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException
 
   at Rawr.SpecialEffect.ToString()
   at Rawr.UI.ItemEditor.UpdateEffectList()
   at Rawr.UI.ItemEditor.Add_Closed(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.OnClosed(EventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.Close()
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.set_DialogResult(Nullable`1 value)
   at Rawr.UI.SpecialEffectEditor.CancelButton_Click(Object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.Button.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(MouseButtonEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(Control ctrl, EventArgs e)
   at MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, String eventName)
